definition: to destroy/to spoil/to ruin/to injure/cruel/oppressive/savage/brutal/incomplete/disabled/to remain/to survive/remnant/surplus
to abolish/to abandon/to abrogate/to discard/to depose/to oust/crippled/abandoned/waste

sentences.english: Chen Wenjie holds geminate leg maimed person, climbing beggar arrive for Chen Qingyun capital.
sentences.chinese: 陈文杰装成双腿残废，爬着要饭供陈青云到京城。

sentences.english: Youth have been out of danger by the emergency, but his right hand was cut off tesujis, probably will be disabled.
sentences.chinese: 经急救少年已脱险，但右手手筋被砍断，恐将残废。

sentences.english: Have you ever laughed at those people with disabilities?
sentences.chinese: 你曾经嘲笑过那些残废人吗？

sentences.english: Cripple's armor and magic penetration lowered to 10 from 25.
sentences.chinese: 残废的护甲与魔法穿透效果从25减少到10。

sentences.english: I was surprised at her marriage to a disabled army man.
sentences.chinese: 她嫁给一个残废军人使我惊讶。

sentences.english: The disabled man is able to enable vegetables to grow on specially established tables.
sentences.chinese: 那个残废人能让蔬菜在特殊放置的桌子上生长。

sentences.english: Palumbo, are you crippled and deaf?
sentences.chinese: 普伦波，你残废了还是耳聋了？

sentences.english: Tony disabled the boy with vicious street fighter moves.
sentences.chinese: 托尼用野蛮的“街霸动作”把男孩打成了残废。

sentences.english: I've been on disability pay ever since the accident.
sentences.chinese: 自从那次事故我就享受残废人待遇了。

sentences.english: His uncle was disabled in the civil war, he lost his left arm.
sentences.chinese: 他的叔父在内战中失去了一条左臂，成了残废人。

sentences.english: He is a semi-invalid now and can't get about as wall as he used to.
sentences.chinese: 他现在是一个半残废的人，不能象过去那样走动。

sentences.english: He was maimed in the car accident.
sentences.chinese: 他在一次车祸中残废了。

sentences.english: NEW YORK - E-mail is crippled, concussed by an irrepressible spam stream.
sentences.chinese: 电子邮件是残废的，因为有持续不断的垃圾邮件冲击。

sentences.english: That old cripple of a Henn.
Polio once crippled 350 000 children a year globally.
sentences.chinese: 脊髓灰质炎曾经每年造成全世界35万儿童残废。

sentences.english: Government also supplies relief for the poor and help for the disabled.
sentences.chinese: 政府还赈济穷人，照顾残废者。

definition: paralysis of one side of the body/hemiplegia
to be crippled (in an accident etc)
person in a vegetative state/human vegetable
to lose one's life/to get killed

a bloody nose and a swollen face/badly battered
